nodes.title: Remove FilterChainBuilder and serialize the steps directly

Change the default retry delay to have exponential growth
Update Kafka dependency, update Kafka-JUnit dependency
Swap around code in try block
[ISSUE-100] - Fix NPE in RatioMessageBuffer on spout deploy
Do not pass empty ending state when loading sidelines
Allow null keys in the Utf8Deserializer
Set sideline defaults when loading config
Switching test to use the in memory persistence adapters
Remove references to sideline from DynamicSpout tests
Minor tweaks relating to our Metric refactor
First pass at a permanently failed output stream from the spout.
Fix failed message leak.  the message was never removed from trackedMap in certain scenarios
Check for nulls and log accordingly, skip as appropriately
More fair partition distribution with weird number of partitions
Check for nulls and log accordingly
first pass at creating a concrete SpoutConfig class, lots of refactor…
Remove un-used method from Consumer interface
Add support for resume state in sidelining
Fix logic around re-adding the firehose
Switch to using ConsumerPartition for sideline persistence
Use a factory to create VirtualSpout instances
Allow ending state to be set after a VirtualSpout has been created
Add missing close implementation, better naming of threads
Fix failing tests from bad merge.
Call close() to ensure background threads are stopped
No longer start virtualspouts from a background thread
Temp branch to play with having Coordinator no longer start VSpouts from background thread
Just compares the differences between CoordinatorFacades <--> CoordinatorRefactor branches
Refactor to use kafka-junit external dependency
Slightly tweak how the metrics are calculated, condense into a single loop

SidelineSpoutHandler should periodically check its state and recover
Drop VirtualSpout.getMaxLag() and pass the MetricsRecorder to Consumer
Add consumer id to the Record object
[ISSUE-33] - trim output field values after splitting
We never use this property, it doesnt really make sense in this context, lets just remove it
[ISSUE-28] - start tracking metric for number of failed VirtualSpouts

Add checks for required configuration options
Improve OutOfRangeExceptions when offset is at the end of topic
